text:
Epilogue:
Beyond Spring, to Your Side

Around the time 'Magical Girl ☆ Snegurochka Season 2' began airing,
a permanent stage at Magical Snowland was—

name: Frosty
text:
"Oh, what a disaster!
At this rate, Snegurochka is going to be defeated!"

name: Frosty
text:
"My power alone is not enough to save her...
What should I doooooo!?"

'Frosty' shouted at the top of his lungs
towards the fan-shaped audience seats.

Then, the palm-sized wands that the
audience members received upon entering began to sparkle.

name: Frosty
text:
"This is... I feel the same power as the magical girl coming from nearby!
If all that light gathers, I might be able to save Snegurochka!?"

name: Frosty
text:
"Everyone! Wave your light sticks and
cheer for Snegurochka with me! Ready—go!"

name: Everyone
text:
Do your best,
Snegurochka—!!

At Frosty's cue, the children in the audience gripped their wands
and cheered for the magical girl with all their might.

After the cheers were repeated several times, a line of light connected
the children's wands to Snegurochka, as if it was done by a stage effect.

name: Snegurochka
text:
What is this... A strange light?
I can hear everyone's voices... Power is welling up from within me!

name: Frosty
text:
"You can do it, Snegurochka!
Alright, now, let's take them down together!"

name: Snegurochka
text:
Understood, Br— Frosty!
Let's end this battle together!

The cast's compelling performance moved the children,
and the stage direction drew them into the world of the story.

The new attraction at Magical Snowland,
'Magical Girl ☆ Snegurochka On Stage,' was—

Sold out every day from the opening day
and instantly became the talk of the town in Tokyo.

One day, after spring had passed, Jack was busy creating a work
of art at night, facing a wall with a spray can.

It was a painting of a magical girl, who stood up and
fought for the wishes of many, even when she was hurt.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Brother... Could it be that I'm the model for this painting?
But the depiction is a little too harsh, don't you think?

name: Jack Frost
text:
It's fine, this is my new artistic frontier.
Besides, this is my way of getting back at you.

name: Snegurochka
text:
I, like your Frosty,
am a being who sells dreams.

name: Jack Frost
text:
What a shame, currently I'm the mysterious street artist,
Anonymous Jack, who lives on the side of reality.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Instead of selling dreams,
I'm selling reality with a little wit and satire.

Jack, seeing Snegurochka's dissatisfied expression,
smiled and handed her a glow stick.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Even so, this is a graffiti I dedicated to you.
After all, I had promised to make a work of art based on you.

name: Jack Frost
text:
The theme is the light and darkness of a magical girl,
and that light stick will illuminate the other side.

As told, Snegurochka shined the light on the graffiti.
Then, the fluorescent paint emerged, and the painting changed.

A magical girl appeared, happily smiling as she got sweets,
plushies, clothes, and her wishes fulfilled.

name: Snegurochka
text:
It's me and Brother Jack, and is that...
[Player] and the others?

name: Jack Frost
text:
I thought I'd try of expanding the range of my graffiti.
Well, it didn't turn out too bad.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Did you know that outside of Tokyo, there's a world where
'winter comes in August and summer comes in December'?

name: Jack Frost
text:
If we could go to such a place—
We wouldn't have to go through all this trouble, and we could have been together forever—

name: Snegurochka
text:
...That's your new dream, isn't it, Brother Jack?
If I make it come true... will you draw another work for me?

name: Jack Frost
text:
...That sounds nice.
Yeah, I'll promise you that.

Jack completed his work by
spray-painting his 'J' signature.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Well, I've kept another promise.
What should we do next, Snegurochka?

name: Snegurochka
text:
It's alright to take it slow.
We have the luxury to take our time now.

name: Snegurochka
text:
But, I have a thought.
I really wanted to do something for everyone.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Right, how about we go
thank the people who helped us?

name: Alp
text:
Hey, hey, please cheer up already~!
We only went to see Hastur, and that's it...

name: Fenrir
text:
Hmph, I'm not upset at all!
I'm not envious of the amusement park in the slightest, alright?

name: Cu Sith
text:
Don't say that, Fenrir-senpai,
I went later as well and the amusement park was amazing!

name: Cu Sith
text:
The churros were sweet and delicious,
and the roller coasters were a bit too exhilarating, but it was fun...!

name: Fenrir
text:
Oh, Cu Sith, you sweet-chirping demon dog...
Are you asking to be defeated by my demonic blade?

name: Leib
text:
Hey, hey, calm down.
I'll take you there some time.

name: Pazuzu
text:
You can go anytime you want, just say the word.
Should we plan a day to go together?

name: Hastur
text: That won't be necessary, Pazuzu!

To a stylish BGM, Hastur, who looked
like a prince, appeared before his companions.

name: Hastur
text:
I shall invite you all to my castle!
Everyone, gather for a ball at Snowland Castle!

Hastur's present was an
invitation to Magical Snowland.

name: Hastur
text:
I've arranged tickets for everyone,
so won't you behave yourselves and come along together?

name: Alp
text:
Wow, that's amazing, Hastur is so generous!
Doesn't that sound good, Fenrir-senpai?

name: Hastur
text:
Hey, you, Alp!
Couldn't you refer to me with some more respect!?

name: Fenrir
text:
Hmph, you are quite bold to invite us to your twilight castle.
But since we've been invited, I suppose we'll go...

Seeing the overjoyed Alp and the others, Hastur snorted in satisfaction.
Pazuzu and Leib were surprised by his actions.

name: Pazuzu
text:
...You've changed. You used to hesitate to interact
with this Pazuzu and everyone else in the dorm.

name: Pazuzu
text:
And now you're trying to ask for my help to save someone...
I'm falling in love with you all over again, little lizard!

name: Leib
text:
Haven't you changed too much!? You're so enthusiastic in a princely manner,
just what has happened while I was up all night?

Nakano Performing Arts Academy, where many actors, talents, and popular figures are enrolled.
Awaiting Korpokkur was the person who appeared with a cheerful cheer.

name: Teda
text:
Nyahahahaha!
Don't be so modest, praise me more!

name: Korpokkur
text:
You're late, you made me wait too long, you little brat!
Did you know that I had to wait here in this outfit because of you?

name: Korpokkur
text:
I was approached by every single person who passed by,
and it was the worst thing that could have ever happened to me!

name: Teda
text:
Come to think of it, that's a strange outfit you're wearing?
What's with the change of heart, nyahaha!?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Shut up, I'm just here to thank you
for helping me with Snegurochka.
Saying that, Korpokkur handed Teda a ticket.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Here, I'm giving it to you. You wanted to go to the amusement park, right?
I hate to be indebted to you.

name: Teda
text:
Ohoho, what's with the sudden change of heart?
Didn't you banish me for being 'too passionate' before?

name: Korpokkur
text:
I told you, I don't want to be indebted to you.
You helped me out with the 'magical girl's' media connections, didn't you?

name: Teda
text:
What, you're being so dramatic about such a small thing...
You really wanted to invite me to the amusement park, don't you?

name: Teda
text:
Nyahahahaha! I forgive you, Korpokkur!
I'll give you the honor of being my escort!

name: Korpokkur
text:
Stop making assumptions!
You, with your adult-like ulterior motives, can just go by yourself!

And here is the after-school classroom of Shinjuku Academy,
where Zhurong and Quantum are enrolled.

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehehe, Zhurong, accept your fate!
I will dye you with evil myself!

name: Zhurong
text:
That's not gonna happen.
I'm a hero of justice, I'll punish you!

name: Quantum
text:
My goodness, Zhurong is
still such a child.

name: Boogeyman
text:
I'd like to apologize, Tianzun-sensei,
for Zhurong making you play with him.

name: Tianzun
text:
No, it's nothing much.
I came here to thank you all for the other day.

name: Tianzun
text:
Zhurong, you worked hard with the newspaper club to make an extra
edition about the second season of 'Magical Girl ☆ Snegurochka', didn't you?

name: Zhurong
text:
Yeah, I worked hard with my seniors on the article.
And I also sent fan letters!

name: Tianzun
text:
Ohhh, is that so!? Zhurong, thanks to the letters from
you and the others, Snegurochka is full of energy.

name: Tianzun
text:
Here, I brought a gift from the magical girl!
It's a ticket to Magical Snowland!

name: Zhurong
text:
Woah— Thank you!
Hehe, let's all go play together!

name: Tianzun
text:
Well, my business here is done.
I'll go visit [Player] now.

And Yoshito visited the people who helped him create the
automaton Eight Dog Warriors and the virtual spring environment.

name: Issac
text:
You're giving these tickets to us?
And so many of them...!

name: Yoshito
text:
Yes, if you hadn't provided the technology,
we wouldn't have been able to save our friends.

name: Yoshito
text:
And the new attraction modeled after the 'spring scenery'
is now a new highlight of Magical Snowland.

name: Yoshito
text:
So, as a small token of my gratitude, I've prepared these invitation tickets.
If you're interested in the amusement park, please come along.

name: Yoshito
text:
We've also prepared many attractions that don't put a strain
on the body and events that you can enjoy from a seat.

name: Tuaring
text:
By the way, how far does Frosty's greeting go?
Is it just for photos? Or can you talk and eat with him?

name: Yoshito
text:
I never thought you'd
be so curious about that.

name: Issac
text:
I'll gladly accept the tickets.
You should also take your important person there while you still have the chance.

name: Tanetomo
text:
To think you'd gather all of us Eight Dog Warriors.
That's certainly rare of you, Yoshito-san.

name: Yoshito
text:
Yes. I wanted to show you the completed automaton
Eight Dog Warriors that I asked you to model for.

name: Moritaka
text:
In that case, I must confirm one thing.
Yoshito, you didn't trick us with sweet words, did you?

name: Moritaka
text:
You said [Player]-dono wanted an automaton...
Yoshito, do not look away!

name: Yoshito
text:
Please rest assured, Moritaka.
'Moritaka' was very popular with the children.

Yoshito pressed the switch on the remote control.
The automaton Eight Dog Warriors began to play a marching song.

name: Yoshito
text:
Now, let's go, Eight Dog Warriors!
Please enjoy the marching band performance!

name: Masanori
text:
It's a little embarrassing, isn't it?
Seeing a toy of yourself moving in such a fanciful way.

name: Nobumichi
text:
They're well-made, Yoshito!
The sharp eyebrows look just like me!

name: Moritaka
text:
Indeed, this is surprisingly not bad...
It's small and somehow cu—

Moritaka's eyes widened, and he stopped mid-sentence.
He realized he had said something he shouldn't have.

name: Yoshito
text:
Hehehe, Moritaka has finally
admitted that he is cute, hasn't he?

name: Yoshito
text:
It seems that all the times I called you cute have finally paid off.
They've all come to fruition now.

name: Moritaka
text:
Ngh... My greatest mistake!
I said 'cute' about myself...

name: Masashi
text:
Oh, Moritaka-dono?
If that's all it takes, you still have a long way to go.

name: Masashi
text:
Because I am loved by Mother,
this cuteness is only natural for me.

name: Yasuyori
text:
And... About [Player], what...
What did they say about our dolls?

name: Tadatomo
text:
It's a given without even asking,
but they said I was number one, right?

With all the Eight Dog Warriors gathered, the room became noisy,
and a debate about whose toy was the best began.

name: Shino
text:
Be quietttt!
What are you all making such a fuss about?

name: Tanetomo
text:
Hehe, Yoshito-san made a
marching band out of our toys.

Shino noticed the small toys that
looked exactly like his sons.

name: Shino
text:
Yoshito, this...
Do you not have one of mine?

name: Yoshito
text:
Um, I was afraid of what would happen if
I made one without your permission and you found out...

name: Shino
text:
Is that so... And, what's with that outfit?
You seem to be quite excited, aren't you?

name: Moritaka
text:
(How unexpected. I never thought you'd be upset
because you didn't have one of yourself...!)

name: Tanetomo
text:
(So this is the kind of feeling a father feels
when he's excluded from the family gathering...)

name: Yoshito
text:
I apologize, I didn't mean to give you such a response.
I'll make sure to ask for another one to be made by the next time.

name: Tanetomo
text:
But Yoshito-san, this wasn't the
only reason you gathered us, was it?

name: Yoshito
text:
That's right, I almost forgot the most important thing.
Everyone, please have this.

He took out amusement park tickets from his pocket
and handed them to the Eight Dog Warriors and Shino.

name: Yoshito
text:
If you'd like, how about...
We all go together on our next day off?

Everyone showed surprised expressions
at the unexpected proposal.

name: Shino
text:
Well, I'm not interested in such a frivolous place,
but if you insist, I'll come along with you?

name: Nobumichi
text:
What's gotten into you, Yoshito?
It's one thing to invite Moritaka, but I'm surprised that you've also asked us.

name: Yoshito
text:
Well, the time we have is only limited...
I learned that it's important to spend time with people you care about.

Nobumichi smiled happily and
ruffled Yoshito's hair roughly.

name: Ryota
text:
Ehh!? Is that okay, [Player]!?
It's going to be so fun, going to the amusement park with everyone!

options.text: Ryota, you did help out with the departure ceremony.
It's going to be fun, everyone.
Save the date for our next day off.

name: Toji
text:
But, is it really okay?
We didn't do anything to help...

name: Kengo
text:
Well, let's just take what we're offered.
It's been a long time since I've been to an amusement park.

name: Shiro
text:
Right, is it okay not to invite Moritaka?
Wouldn't it be better if we all went together?

options.text: Maybe we'll split up this time?

name: Ryota
text:
Alright, let's plan our day at the amusement park!
Hehe, I love planning these things.

name: Kengo
text:
We can just wing it.
Still, I'm only interested in the food.

name: Ryota
text:
No, no, no, you have to be efficient at an amusement park!
We don't have all the time in the world!

name: Shiro
text:
There are a lot of tickets.
Does that include Agyo and the others' shares too? That's generous.

As everyone was talking and planning
their amusement park trip, a sudden intruder appeared—

name: Tianzun
text:
Wah-hah-hah-hah-hah!
I'm taking your [Player] with me!

Leaving the stunned classmates behind,
Tianzun flew off.
As [Player] is held in his arms,they are then brought to a certain place.

name: Hastur
text:
Hmph, you're here at last, [Player].
Finally, I've been tired of waiting.

name: Yoshito
text:
Tianzun, you brought Master respectfully, didn't you?
Their clothes and hair seem a little messed up...

name: Tianzun
text:
What, what?
We're going on an attraction anyway, so it's fine, isn't it?

options.text: I was in the middle of a conversation!
You wanted to go to the amusement park with me so much?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Can you excuse me?
Actually, I had something I wanted to give to everyone.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Be grateful, alright?
We only give something like this to you.

What Snegurochka handed them
was a lifetime pass to Magical Snowland.

Engraved with 'Frosty's Cheerful Friends',
it was a special gift for [Player] and the others.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Come visit anytime.
An after-school amusement park is quite nice, isn't it?

options.text: Thank you for the wonderful present!
After-school amusement park is the best!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ehehe, I'm glad you're happy.
Alright everyone, let's go play today too!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Magical Girl Snegurochka will give everyone
wonderful memories at the amusement park!

name: Hastur
text:
I suppose I'll go along with it.
It seems that the lonely polar bear wants us to be with him.

name: Yoshito
text:
So that's why you prepared something like this.
By the way, can I also get a share for Moritaka?
I'll work twice as hard as both a customer and a cast member!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Shut up, you guys!
And I'm not happy about it at all.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hey, hey, actually,
I want to plan our next outing today too!

name: Snegurochka
text:
When it gets a little warmer,
how about we all go glamping in the mountains?

name: Tianzun
text:
Wow, that's amazing!
I have a lot of events I want to take you to as well!

name: Korpokkur
text:
That's a great idea, Snegurochka!
Tianzun, if you take them somewhere weird, I'll immediately freeze you?

name: Tianzun
text:
What, Korpokkur, you're still as cold as ever~!
Let's be more about love and peace, alright?

name: Korpokkur
text:
Haha, my bad.
Please forgive me, I'm being quite gentle here.

Snegurochka and the others passed through the
gate and disappeared into the children's paradise.

The magical girl's story continued into the future,
even after winter had passed.

Holy Night Transformation!?
Magical Snowland
- END -
